mapper.select: SELECT note_id, note_title, note_cont, note_date, user_id FROM note WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT * FROM note WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY note_date DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN 5 * (#{page} - 1) + 1 AND #{page} * 5
SELECT note_id, note_title, note_cont, note_date, user_id FROM note WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note ( note_id, note_title, note_cont, note_date, user_id ) VALUES ( 'NOTE'||LPAD(NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,4,'0'), #{noteTitle}, #{noteCont}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET note_title = #{noteTitle}, note_cont = #{noteCont}, note_date = SYSDATE WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
